unnormalised: Arre yaar, this recipe is so good! I tried it and it came out amazing. I used exactly 250 g of maida, 100 ml of milk, and about 5 g of baking powder. Next time, I might add a little bit more sugar, maybe around 75 g instead of 50g 'cause I like it extra sweet. It baked perfectly at 180Â°C for like, 30 mins in my oven.
normalised: Arre yaar, this recipe is so good! I tried it and it came out amazing. I used exactly two hundred and fifty gram of maida, one hundred milliliter of milk, and about five gram of baking powder. Next time, I might add a little bit more sugar, maybe around seventy five gram instead of fifty gram 'cause I like it extra sweet.
